body:
Comment 2 by **rahulrevo**: 
The remote packages section in "How to Write Go Code" http://golang.org/doc/code.html
says
$ go get code.google.com/p/go.example/hello
$ $GOPATH/bin/hello
Hello, world.  Sqrt(2) = 1.414213562373095

Since beginners like me are going to be running these examples I highly recommend the
right behavior here and some other example for 'go vet'.

Otherwise create another example for 'go get' and link that code.html
